description: Table T(n,k) by antidiagonals of n^(k-1) mod k [n,k > 0].
links: Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
Index entries for sequences related to Carmichael numbers.
crossrefs: Cf. A002997, A060154. Rows include A057427, A062173, A062174, A062175, A062176. Columns include A000004, A000035, A011655, A010684 with interleaved 0's, A011558, A010875. Diagonals include all the rows again and A000004 and A009001 unsigned.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 12 2001
